data.title: The Mirror Has Two Faces
data.meta_description: Culver City, CA: Columbia Pictures, 1996. Vintage studio still photograph from the 1996 film, showing one image of actors Lauren Bacall and Barbra Streisand, and one image of Bacall and Jeff Bridges. A middle-aged English literature professor leads a lonely life with her acerbic mother in New York, but believes she has a second chance at happiness after meeting a handsome, neurotic Columbia professor. Set and shot on location in New York.
data.text:
Barbra Streisand (director, starring)

Richard LaGravenese (screenwriter)

Jeff Bridges, Pierce Brosnan, George Segal (starring)

Culver City, CA: Columbia Pictures, 1996. Vintage studio still photograph from the 1996 film, showing one image of actors Lauren Bacall and Barbra Streisand, and one image of Bacall and Jeff Bridges.

A middle-aged English literature professor leads a lonely life with her acerbic mother in New York, but believes she has a second chance at happiness after meeting a handsome, neurotic Columbia professor.

Set and shot on location in New York.

8 x 10 inches. About Fine.

[Book #154473]
